statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ 10 \\ 7 \\ 6 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 30 \\ 20 \\ 10 \\ 10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ 26 \\ 18 \\ 14 \\ 18 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 45 \\ -135 \\ -90 \\ -45 \\ -45 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
